GSD.description:
jfs: prevent NULL deref in diFree

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit d2e45f0bc25da09efcac658d6e405115fcfa83c2. For more details please see the references link.
